name: Mini Party (English)
description:
The Party Begins !

Play various mini-games :

-PONG

-CRAZY RACE

-HIDE & SEEK

-FLY LIKE A BIRD

and a new mini-game : THE MUSIC MAKER ! 

PLAY & DOWNLOAD FOR FREE !

Only for Windows.

Musics from the game are to they owners.

(C) The Carnival Night Music and more  (Sonic The Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles) are a property  to SEGA & Sonic Team

(C) The music : Sonic CD - Boss!!! US and Sonic CD US : Game Over (Sonic The Hedgehog CD) are property from SEGA & Sonic Team.

MicroGames Corporation.
